trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
The PluralizationService class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> class.

Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
The newly created <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> culture.
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
Determines whether the specified word is plural.
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.

Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
The value to be analyzed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is plural; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the specified word is singular.
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.

Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
The value to be analyzed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is singular; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the plural form of the specified word
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
The word to be made plural.
The plural form of the input parameter.
Returns the singular form of the specified word.
The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
The word to be made singular.
The singular form of the input parameter.
